column5: Welcome aboard from a fellow Londoner. When does your season run on Lac Seul, will you have any early or late fishing here in Southwestern Ontario?

Hi Taper.  I will be at my camp on probably the 3rd of May.  I think our first guests arrive on the 16th.  The first few days will be pike only then i believe walleye opener is the 19th.  I'll be up there till the end of September when our lodge shuts down.  So, hopefully i'll be able to get a few fishin missions in here in London before i leave.  thanks again everyone for welcoming me.

Hey everyone!!  I am a long long long time lurker here.  I have no idea why i havent registered here yet, beacuse i check this site very frequently, but im here now.  As for me im from London, but have lived and/or worked everywhere from Val D'Or Quebec to Whistler BC.  Ive fished as long as i can remember and am truely addicted to it.  Being from London, i mainly fished bass (largies and smallies), carp and pike growing up, but im game for fishing whatever will bite.  I am a fishing guide on Lac Seul.  A few of you here may know a few of my buddies from work.  BenBeattie formerly known as trapshooter as well as icewalker are both good buddies of mine and are great guys to work with and are members of this forum.  Lace Seul is a true gem.  The fishing there is insane.  A bad day on Lac Seul is better than a good day on a lot of the places i fished growing up.  If any of you ever have the chance to fish there, do it!!!  you will not regret it.  Anyway, i love this forum.  This is a true community.  Ive been a member of forums here in Ontario as well as BC and Alberta, and this is by far the best.  There is so much usefull information on here as well as humour, news, pictures, its great.  I look forward to contributing here in the future.  talk to you all soon.  Mike
Welcome aboard, Mike. Glad you registered and we're looking forward to hearing of your adventures.
Roy, thanks bud!!  i see you are up as late as i am.  that fish in your avatar is a beauty!!
I'm not up late, Mike, I'm up early. :-)
Morning Mike and welcome to the board. Remember we like pictures.....Lots of pictures!
Welcome aboard from another Londoner and a new member too.  Splashhopper
Welcome Mike, looking forward to your reports and sharing your expertise! Another new Londoner eh? That's 3 or 4 in the last two weeks! We might have to book the JLC for the next swill. -Brian
Welcome Mike...  Hey Brian...as Roy would say " Why not Bernies on Oxford St...LOL"
So that's why we haven't been seeing you there Norm! Bernie's is on Adelaide, just SOUTH of Oxford
Great intro Mike.   Welcome aboard.
maybe we can coordinate a day to go fishing soon?
Welcome Mike.
Hello and welcome to the board..
Welcome to the community Mike!   Look forward to reading your posts and getting to know you.
Welcome to the board Mike look forward to your reports  Rob
Welcome Mike...you'll enjoy the board...no more lurking.
welcome to the board and look forward to posts

The first step is admitting you have a problem....you've finally registered....this addiction called OFC is a pretty powerful one.  Welcome to the board...since you've been reading a while, you already know lots of us I'd assume.  Looking forward to your reports!
Another lurker out's himself.    Good for you.  Welcome aboard Mike.
Welcome

Welcome aboard Mike, fairly new in here myself. I also live in London. I agree this is a great board. There is always something in here to read about.  Many members contribute in here one way or another.Doesn't matter what kind of fishing you do or  whether you have a boat or not, there is something in here for just about everyone.
....Great to have you here Mike. Always thought of hitting Lac Seul some day before I die.
Welcome abaord mike,fellow fishing addict !!!!  ...well enjoy the ride,and we look forward to seeing lots of those lac suel fishing trip/reports with oh-ya tons of pictures!!! cheers & tightlines

hey everyone!  thanks a lot for the warm welcome here.  i do feel like i know a lot of you already from reading so many posts on this board.  i will definitely get some of my pics posted on here soon.  unfortunateley there arent too many recent ones as this is a slower time of the year for me as im sure it is with a lot of you too.  I do have lots from lac seul and guarantee i'll have a lot more while im guiding up there this summer.  its good to see that there are a few londoners here too.  look forward to helping any way i can.  i see a lot of you are familiar with lac seul.  it is definitely worth the trip.  i said it before, but the fishing is outstanding.  on our section of the lake we have amazing walleye fishing fishing, both for size and numbers.  the smallmouth fishing is really good as well.  the bass on that lake are like footballs and they have awesome colouration.  there are some monster pike swimming around in there too.  cant wait to get back up there.  anyway, once again thanks for the welcome.  this is the best online fishing forum there is.  talk to you all soon.  mike
